summary: In this delightful romantic comedy, four beautiful women attempt to deal with their sexual frustrations in fashionable Rome society.
cast: Ursula Andress|Virna Lisi|Claudine Auger|Marisa Mell|Brett Halsey|Jean-Pierre Cassel|Frank Wolff|Marco Guglielmi|Mario Adorf|Lia Zoppelli|Margherita Guzzinati|Luciano Salce|Lando Buzzanca|Vittorio Caprioli|Franco Fabrizi|Arthur Hansel|Stash Klossowski|Nicoletta Machiavelli|Pietro Morfea|Nello Pazzafini|Giovanni Ivan Scratuglia|Luis Valenzano Aloisi|Fred Williams
title: Problemas extraconyugales
